title: tanjam tanjam tanjam
sahitya:
tanjam tanjam tanjam unnaDi sadguru nAthanE


anupallavi

  anjal anjal enrOr shen shollAl ennuLLam panca ghOSAtIta parabrahmattai kATTinai


caraNam    attanE shuddhanE adyAtma bOdhanE Ananda nAyakanE nittiya muttanE tattuvAtItanE
ninmala cinmayanE tatvamasi ennum advaitAnubhava cittanE shaktanE ciTrambalattanE
